trans-unit.source: The timeout manager to use for an <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要用于 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 对象的超时管理器。

trans-unit.source: The timeout manager defines the connection timeout limits for a <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: 超时管理器定义的连接超时限制<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, allowed for the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> to drain the entity body on a Keep-Alive connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 在保持的连接上侦听完实体正文的时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, allowed for the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> to drain the entity body on a Keep-Alive connection.
trans-unit.target: 允许的时间，以秒为单位，<see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" />排出保持活动状态的连接上的实体正文。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 2 分钟。

trans-unit.source: On a Keep-Alive connection, after the app has sent a response for a request and before the request entity body has completely arrived, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> starts draining the remainder of the entity body to reach another potentially pipelined request from the client.
trans-unit.target: Keep-alive 连接时后应用程序已发送请求的响应并在请求之前已完全到达实体主体，,<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>启动排出可能到达另一个实体主体的其余部分通过管道传递从客户端的请求。

trans-unit.source: If the time to drain the remaining entity body exceeds the allowed period the connection is timed out.
trans-unit.target: 如果以耗尽剩余的实体主体的时间超过允许的段连接已超时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, allowed for the request entity body to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许请求实体正文到达的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, allowed for the request entity body to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 允许请求实体正文到达的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 2 分钟。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> turns on this timer when the request has an entity body.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>请求具有实体主体时启用此计时器。

trans-unit.source: The timer expiration is initially set to the configured value.
trans-unit.target: 计时器过期最初设置为配置的值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> receives additional data indications on the request, it resets the timer to give the connection another interval.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>接收其他数据指示在请求时，它将重置计时器以提供另一个间隔的连接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, allowed for the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> to parse the request header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 分析请求标头的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, allowed for the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> to parse the request header.
trans-unit.target: 允许 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 分析请求标头的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 2 分钟。

trans-unit.source: This timeout is only enforced after the first request on the connection is routed to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>.
trans-unit.target: 连接上的第一个请求路由到后，仅强制执行此超时<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>。

trans-unit.source: The system cannot determine the request queue or URL group that the request is associated with until the headers have been parsed.
trans-unit.target: 系统无法确定请求队列或之前已分析的标头，与关联的请求的 URL 组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> enforces the default <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager.HeaderWait%2A> timer for the first request on a connection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>强制执行默认<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager.HeaderWait%2A>计时器在连接上的第一个请求。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent requests on a Keep-Alive connection will use the value set on this property.
trans-unit.target: 保持活动状态的连接上的后续请求将使用此属性上设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, allowed for an idle connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许空闲连接的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, allowed for an idle connection.
trans-unit.target: 允许空闲连接的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 2 分钟。

trans-unit.source: This timeout is only enforced after the first request on the connection is routed to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>.
trans-unit.target: 连接上的第一个请求路由到后，仅强制执行此超时<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>。

trans-unit.source: The system cannot determine the request queue or URL group that the request is associated with until the headers have been parsed.
trans-unit.target: 系统无法确定请求队列或之前已分析的标头，与关联的请求的 URL 组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> enforces the default <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager.IdleConnection%2A> timer for the first request on a connection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>强制执行默认<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager.IdleConnection%2A>计时器在连接上的第一个请求。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent requests on a Keep-Alive connection will use the value set on this property.
trans-unit.target: 保持活动状态的连接上的后续请求将使用此属性上设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum send rate, in bytes-per-second, for the response.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置响应的最低发送速率（以每秒字节数为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The minimum send rate, in bytes-per-second, for the response.
trans-unit.target: 响应的最低发送速率（以每秒字节数为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default response send rate is 150 bytes-per-second.
trans-unit.target: 默认响应发送速率是 150 字节每秒。

trans-unit.source: To disable this timer, set <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager.MinSendBytesPerSecond%2A> to MAXULONG.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用此计时器，设置<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerTimeoutManager.MinSendBytesPerSecond%2A>到 MAXULONG。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, allowed for the request to remain in the request queue before the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> picks it up.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 选取请求前允许请求在请求队列中停留的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, allowed for the request to remain in the request queue before the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> picks it up.
trans-unit.target: 允许在 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 选取请求前请求在请求队列中停留的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 2 分钟。
